navigationTabs.headline: Who am I?
navigationTabs.text:
Hi. I am a Web Developer and this is my new website.

If you are reading this, then you are probably woundering what life decisions made you come to this place. But before you go too far into questioning yourself, you can question me! Click the button bellow to find more!

navigationTabs.headline: Interesting stuff
navigationTabs.text: Attention! Attention! For the past few years I dedicated myself to discover the secrets of the universe! Is the world actually flat? Are there reptilians pretending to be human amongst us? How does the JavaScript debouncer actually works? Find out in my personal blog, crafted and refined for YOU!

navigationTabs.headline: Relax
navigationTabs.text:
I'v created an experiment webpage where you can interact with a database.

Frontend - React with Redux
Backend - NodeJS, ExpressJS, Docker, Redis and PostgreSQL.

Relax and check if you can interact with the database!
